issues.description: The problem statement refers to the date‐of‐birth attribute as `dob`, but both the template and solution `Person` class use the field `birthday`. This mismatch can confuse students when mapping the problem’s requirements to the code.
issues.suggested_fix: Either rename the `birthday` field in the code to `dob`, or update the problem statement to refer to `birthday` instead of `dob` to align terminology.

issues.description: The problem statement describes the persistence layer class as `PersonDAO`, but the starter code and solution define it as `PersonRepository`. This inconsistency may mislead students looking for a DAO class that does not exist.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement to refer to `PersonRepository` (Spring Data JPA) instead of `PersonDAO` to match the code artifacts.
